attributes.action: Ban the film Corpus Christi in this country as it is disrespectful to all Christians
attributes.additional_details: This film being released in the USA later this year before coming here depicts our Lord Jesus as an active homosexual with his disciples. You may have been disgusted by the email you have read now is the time to stand up and sign a petition to ban the film and play from the UK. Christian people are fairly easy going but this is too much and must be stopped!!!!

rejection.details: Film classification is a matter for the British Board of Film Classification.
